Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Necropolis Avenue, between the Bushman Estates.
Room.LongDescription: The Bushman Plantation is located on the east side of the road, and the Bushman Farms are located on the west side. The Plantation grows a number of commodities like peanuts and indigo. The Farms grows fruits and vegetables. There is a small Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Stand on the northeastern corner of the Farm where the produce is sold to the public.
